solution_line_template: Olaf is {beckett_age} years + {years_younger_than_olaf} years = <<{beckett_age}+{years_younger_than_olaf}={olaf_age}>>{olaf_age} years old.
Shannen is {olaf_age} years old - {years_younger_than_olaf_shannen} years = <<{olaf_age}-{years_younger_than_olaf_shannen}={shannen_age}>>{shannen_age} years old.
Jack is {jack_more_than_twice_shannen} years + ({twice_multiplier} * {shannen_age} years) = <<{jack_more_than_twice_shannen}+({twice_multiplier}*{shannen_age})={jack_age}>>{jack_age} years old.
The sum of all of their ages is {beckett_age} + {olaf_age} + {shannen_age} + {jack_age} = <<{beckett_age}+{olaf_age}+{shannen_age}+{jack_age}={total_age_sum}>>{total_age_sum} years old.
